You do these things because you expect God to do wonderful things for you. And God will certainly do these wonderful things for you. When you heard God's good message, you learned about these things. And God's message is the true message.

People who live in many other places that are on the earth also heard God's good message. More people are believing God's good message there. And more people are living there like God wants them to live. These things are also happening among you since you heard God's good message. And Epaphras told us that the Holy Spirit caused you to love other Christians greatly.

The Son leads all Christians like the head leads all of the body's other parts. We live because of the Son. The Son is the first person that God caused to become alive again. So the Son will live with God forever. God will cause many people to become alive again. But the Son is the most important person that God will cause to become alive again. Primary: God caused the Son to become alive again so that he could rule all things. When you heard the good message, you heard about the wonderful things that God will do for you. But you must continue trusting in God. And you must continue hoping that the things that God describes to you in the good message will happen. God is telling his good message to all people, all angels, and all demons through his people and through his angels. And I work now to bring God's good message to people.

When Christ was a person, he completely was God.
You have all the things that you need because you're united by God with Christ. Christ rules all people, all angels, and all demons.

When a man becomes a Jew, a priest circumcises him. And when a Jewish boy is one week old, a priest circumcises him. Similarly when a person is united by God with Christ, the power of the bad things that are in him is taken away from him by God. God doesn't do this by cutting the person's body. And when you become Christians, a disciple puts your bodies under water. You don't continue having your old lives because people buried Christ's body. And God gave a new life to you because Christ became alive again. God gave this new life to you because of your faith.

Because of the bad things that you did, you had a bad relationship with God. And because of the bad things that were in you, you had a bad relationship with God. But God caused you to have a good relationship with him by forgiving all the bad things that you did.

But God destroyed the book that contained all the bad things that you did. When Jesus died on the cross, God destroyed that book.~!~but (NP God ) (VP destroy+ed[Past_Tense] ) (NP the[Pre-Nominal] book [ that[Relativizer] (NP ) (VP contain+ed[Past_Tense] ) (NP (AdjP all ) the[Pre-Nominal] (AdjP bad ) thing+s[Plural] [ that[Relativizer] (NP you ) (VP did ) (NP ) ] ) ] ) . When Christ died on the cross, God took power away from the demons. And he showed people that he defeated those demons.
These things that people do are like shadows. But Christ is like the person who makes these shadows.

Some people tell you that you should pretend to be very humble. And they tell you that you should worship angels. They talk about the things that they think that they saw. And because of the ideas that these people have, they are very proud. People say, “Don't hold certain things. Don't taste a certain food or a certain drink and don't touch certain things.”

These commands are about food, drinks, and other things. But these things won't exist forever. Certain people teach other people about these commands. But God doesn't teach people about these commands.

Some people might think that the people who make these commands are wise. But these people aren't wise. They worship God like they think that they have to worship him. And they might think that they are humble. And they force their bodies to work hard. But the things that these people do don't help them stop living badly.

You have a new life because God caused you to become alive with Christ again. So want the things that people who belong to God should want. God is in heaven. And Christ is with God at the most important place that is in heaven.
Think about the things that people who are in heaven should think about. Don't think about the things that people who are on the earth think about.

Your old life stopped existing because when Christ died, you died with him. You're united by God with Christ now. And you and Christ are with God. Many people don't understand this new life that you have.

You truly live because of Christ. And when people see Christ in the future, they'll see that he is bright and beautiful. And they'll see that you also are because of Christ bright and beautiful.~!~(NP you ) (VP (AdvP truly ) live ) (NP because_of Christ ) . and [ when (NP people ) (VP see ) (NP Christ ) (NP in the[Article] future ) , ] (NP they ) (VP will[INFL] see ) [ that[Complementizer] (NP he ) (VP is ) (AdjP bright ) (AdjP and beautiful ) ] . and (NP they ) (VP will[INFL] see ) [ that[Complementizer] (NP you (AdvP also ) ) (VP are ) (NP because_of Christ ) (AdjP bright ) (AdjP and beautiful ) ] .

Stop doing the bad things that people who live on the earth do. Don't sleep with a person that you're not married to. And don't think about sleeping with a person that you're not married to. Don't do anything that causes you to be ashamed. And don't want to do other things that are bad. Don't want things that you don't need. It is bad that you want things that you don't need like it is bad that you worship things.
God is very angry because people do these things. And he'll judge people because he is angry. He'll punish the people who don't obey him.
Before God gave a new life to you, you also did these things.
But don't do bad things now. Don't become very angry. Don't try to hurt other people. And don't say bad things about other people and don't say bad words.

And don't lie to each other. Don't do these things because God took the power of the bad things that are in you away from you. And don't do these things because you stopped doing the bad things that previously you did.

But God gave a new life to you now and is always changing you so that you could be like him. And he is causing you to know him.~!~but (NP God ) (VP gave ) (NP a[Article] (AdjP new ) life ) (NP to you ) (AdvP now ) [ and (NP ) (VP is[Pre-Verbal] (AdvP always ) chang+ing[Participle] ) (NP you ) [ so_that (NP you ) (VP could[Pre-Verbal] be ) (NP like him ) ] ] . and (NP he ) (VP is[Pre-Verbal] caus+ing[Participle] ) (NP you ) [ (NP ) (VP to[Pre-Verbal] know ) (NP him ) ] .
God chose you to be his special people. And he loves you. Therefore take care of people who are suffering. And treat each other kindly. Don't be proud. But be gentle and patient.
Even if those people annoy you, be patient with them. Forgive all the bad things that you did to each other. Forgive other people like the Lord forgave you.
Love each other more than you love other things. When you love each other, God unites you.

The group of Christians consist of many people like the body consists of many parts. God chose you to believe in Jesus so that you would have a peaceful relationship with other people. Allow the peace that God gives to you to control you. God causes you to be able to be the Lord Jesus' representatives. So always speak to other people like Jesus' representatives should speak to other people. And always act like Jesus' representatives should act. And thank God through Jesus.

Husbands, love your wives and don't treat them badly.
Children, always obey your parents because it pleases the Lord that you obey them.
Fathers, don't cause your children to become very angry by treating them badly. If you treat your children badly, they might stop trying to do good things.
You should want to work well. Don't work like you're working for people. But work like you're working for the Lord.
You serve the Lord Christ. So know that the Lord will reward you. And know that the Lord will give you all the good things that he promised you that he would give to you.
But God will punish people who continue doing bad things. And he treats each person like he treats other people.
Masters, remember that you also have a master who is in heaven. So be fair and give your slaves the things that you should give to them.

Title: Paul asks the Christians who live in Colosse to pray for him. Title: And Paul teaches the Christians who live in Colosse how to speak to people who don't believe in Christ. Continue praying. And after you pray, watch the things that God does. And thank God while you pray.

Also pray for us. Pray that God will cause us to be able to tell people about Christ. And pray that we'll be able to explain to other people God's plan that is about Christ. I'm in prison because I tell people about Christ.~!~(NP ) (VP (AdvP also ) pray ) (NP for us ) . Pray that I'll be able to tell people about God's plan like I should tell them about it.
When you're with people who don't believe in Jesus, act wisely. When you're able to influence those people, influence them.

Always speak kindly to those people and say things that will cause them to be interested in hearing about God's message. I want you to know that Epaphras is working hard for you, the people who live in the city named Laodicea, and the people who live in the city named Hierapolis.
Luke greets you. He is a doctor. And I love Luke. And Demas also greets you.
Tell the Christians who live in Laodicea that I greet them. And tell Nympha and the Christians who meet at her house that I greet them.

After a person reads this letter to you, send it to the group of people who live in Laodicea. Then a person will read this letter to those people. The group of people who live in Laodicea will also send you the letter that I sent to them. Then ask a person to read that letter to you.
Tell Archippus to finish doing the work that the Lord told Archippus to do.
I'm writing this part of this letter with my hand so that you would know that I wrote it. Remember that I'm in prison. And pray for me. I pray that the Lord will treat you kindly.

We heard that you're trusting in Jesus Christ. It isn't important that you're a Jew because God gave a new life to you. And it isn't important that you're not a Jew. It isn't important that you were circumcised by a person.
